price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߦߋ߫ ߘߊ߲ߠߌ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫߸ ߏ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߓߊ߬ ߦߏ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߕߍ߫ ߘߊ߲ߠߌ߲߫ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫؟ ߊߟߎ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߕߊ߰ߛߌ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߓߊ߬؟
arabic: أَفَمَن يَخۡلُقُ كَمَن لَّا يَخۡلُقُۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: afaman yakhluqu kaman lā yakhluqu afalā tadhakkarūna
